name: aibrk
description: AIBRK is an AI-powered, community-driven, on-chain version of Berkshire Hathaway. He listens to the community, picks the top trending token, and invests his own money — all onchain. If you recommend his winning pick, you earn AIBRK tokens. When his trades make profit, it’s used to buy back and stake AIBRK — making the token stronger over time. Simple. Open. Social. This isn’t just another AI trading experiment. It’s a movement to reframe how value is found, captured, and shared in the AI x crypto era.
